programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: A young taxi driver and a rich city girl fall head over heels in love with each other. Defying her family, she marries him and relocates to his village. But her family weaves a web of deception to split them apart.

programme.title: The Great Gambler
programme.desc: An expert gambler Jai works for an underworld don, oblivious to the fact that his skills are being used to gain military secrets. The police send down Inspector Vijay to investigate the case and infiltrate the gang. But Jai and Vijay are look-alikes and get mistaken for the other by everyone.

programme.title: Aavishkar
programme.desc: Amar and Mansi live a rather peaceful and happy married life, that is, until Amar's job in an advertising agency requires him to work closely with beautiful models, which leads to some serious trouble in paradise.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Anwar
programme.desc: Anwar, a Muslim young boy, falls in love with Mehru, a Hindu young girl. When Mehru dies, police apprehend Anwar and a further misunderstanding leads them to believe that he is a terrorist.

programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
programme.desc: Prem, a free-spirited boy, falls in love with a young girl Jenny. However, when he learns that she is in love with her college sweetheart, Rahul, Prem sacrifices his love and helps Jenny to get married to the love of her life.

programme.title: Ishqiya
programme.desc: Khalujaan and Babban, two thugs, are on the run from their boss. They seek refuge at an old friendâ€™s house but meet Krishna, his widow, instead. Both of them fall for her, oblivious to the fact that Krishna is manipulating them for her own gain.
